set(MP3LAME_SRC_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/cmake")
ensure_build_dir(MP3LAME_BUILD_DIR)
if(FFMPEG_BUNDLED STREQUAL "static")
	library_import_static_hint(MP3LAME_LIBRARY "mp3lame" "${FFMPEG_INSTALL_DIR}/${CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR}")
else()
	library_import_hint(MP3LAME_LIBRARY "mp3lame" "${FFMPEG_INSTALL_DIR}/${CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR}")
endif()
set(MP3LAME_COMPONENT "MP3 encoder LAME")
set(MP3LAME_OPTIONS
	"-DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=${CMAKE_SHARED_MODE}"
	"-DCMAKE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE=ON"
	"-DCMAKE_ASM_NASM_FLAGS=-DPIC -w-pp-macro-params-legacy"
)

create_cmake_configure_file(
	MP3LAME_CMAKE_CONFIGURE_FILE
	"${MP3LAME_COMPONENT}"
	"${MP3LAME_SRC_DIR}"
	"${MP3LAME_BUILD_DIR}"
	"${FFMPEG_INSTALL_DIR}"
	"${MP3LAME_OPTIONS}"
	2
)
include("${MP3LAME_CMAKE_CONFIGURE_FILE}")

add_custom_target(mp3lame_build
	COMMAND ${ENV_CMAKE_COMMAND} --build "${MP3LAME_BUILD_DIR}"
	WORKING_DIRECTORY "${MP3LAME_BUILD_DIR}"
	COMMENT "Building MP3 encoder LAME"
	USES_TERMINAL
)

add_custom_target(mp3lame_install
	COMMAND ${ENV_CMAKE_SILENT_COMMAND} --build "${MP3LAME_BUILD_DIR}" --target install
	WORKING_DIRECTORY "${MP3LAME_BUILD_DIR}"
	COMMENT "Installing internally MP3 encoder LAME"
	DEPENDS mp3lame_build
)

set(mp3lame_outputs "${MP3LAME_LIBRARY}" PARENT_SCOPE)
